QuestData.Title: Shady Sanctuary
QuestData.Description:
We must inform the rest of the green dragonflight that the barrier to the Ancient Bough is under threat. Gerithus and I have much to discuss.
$n, I will place my mark upon you. The other dragons who see it will know that you are my trusted messenger.
Go and rally my flight. They must know and prepare for the battle ahead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Guard-Captain Alowen, Sariosa, Sidra the Mender, and Viranikus.
QuestData.RewardText: My dragonflight is ready, then? Good. We will confront our enemies with everything we have.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Aronus to visit Merithra's Watch
